abstract.t: This draft contains example packets exchanged by nodes implementing the following 6tisch drafts: draft-ietf-6tisch-minimal, draft-wang- 6tisch-6top-sublayer, draft-ietf-6lo-routing-dispatch and draft-ietf- 6lo-paging-dispatch. All packets are presented both in raw binary and fully parsed contents. This document can be used as a reference when implementing the previous mentioned drafts.
